name: Elspeth
text: Looks like everything is still alive, so I’d say you’re doing a fine job...

name: Elspeth
text: Anyhoo… You’re probably wondering how you’re supposed to get new research samples...

name: Elspeth
text: This is the expedition board. Here, you can send adventurers out on expeditions into the dungeon to bring back loot...

name: Elspeth
text: And if you were looking for something to do with all those potions...

name: Elspeth
text: Oh, silly me! You haven’t met any of our adventurers yet, have you?...

name: Elspeth
text: Alright, I’ll send over one of our uh… top adventurers. You may not be able to tell when you meet him, but he has a lot of potential...

name: Elspeth
text: There’s a mountain of paperwork with my name on it back at the guild, so I’ll get back to the grind...
